title: Integrated Online Science-English Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Customized course for administrators/leaders aiming to enhance English communication skills in scientific contexts required in workplace settings, incorporating individual device use and project-based assessment systems

learning_goals: Learners can accurately summarize core content with over 80% precision while reading English scientific papers and reports.
Learners can improve their scientific-technical English presentation skills by over 70% through role-playing based on work scenarios.
Learners can reduce grammatical error rates by 50% while writing scientific-themed English essays using a peer feedback system.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
